title: Sanctions Spur Calls to Make Private Equity Vet Investors
sub_head: Lawmakers concerned about Russian and Chinese money in U.S. private funds want to bring investorsâ€™ identities to light
body: In an effort to clamp down on potentially illicit Russian and Chinese money in the U.S. economy, lawmakers are urging new rules to make private fund managers disclose more information about their investors.
